title: How to Reserve a Spot for an Event
content:
If a user asks how to reserve an event:

- Guide them to the CultPass app
- Instruct them to browse the experience catalog and tap 'Reserve'
- If it's a premium or limited event, check if reservation confirmation is required via email
- Remind them to arrive at least 15 minutes early with their QR code visible

**Suggested phrasing:**
"You can reserve an experience by opening the CultPass app, selecting your desired event, and tapping 'Reserve'. Be sure to arrive 15 minutes early with your QR code ready."

title: What's Included in a CultPass Subscription
content:
Each user is entitled to 4 cultural experiences per month, which may include:
- Art exhibitions
- Museum entries
- Music concerts
- Film screenings and more

Some premium experiences may require an additional fee (visible in the app).

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Your CultPass subscription includes 4 curated experiences each month. You can choose from museums, concerts, film events and more. Premium events may have an extra cost, which is shown during reservation."

title: How to Cancel or Pause a Subscription
content:
Users can manage their subscription via the app > 'My Account' > 'Manage Plan'.

- Cancel: Effective at the end of the billing cycle
- Pause: Preserves user data, resumes automatically when reactivated
- Do NOT offer refunds unless approved by support lead

**Suggested phrasing:**
"You can cancel or pause your subscription at any time via the 'My Account' section in the CultPass app. Cancelation takes effect at the end of your billing cycle."

title: How to Handle Login Issues?
content:
Most login issues are resolved with password reset:

- Ask the user to tap 'Forgot Password' on the login screen
- Ensure they are using the correct registered email
- If they did not receive the reset email, check spam folder or retry after 10 minutes
- For persistent login issues, escalate to human support

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Try tapping 'Forgot Password' on the login screen. Make sure you're using the email associated with your account. If the email doesn't arrive, check spam or try again in a few minutes."

title: Refund Policy and Eligibility
content:
Refunds are not automatic. In general:

- If the user has an active subscription and was charged incorrectly (duplicate charge / wrong plan), they may be eligible.
- If the user missed an event or forgot to cancel, refunds are typically not offered.
- Always confirm the date of charge and the last 4 digits of the payment method before escalating.

**Suggested phrasing:**
"I can help check this. Could you confirm the date of the charge and whether it looks like a duplicate or an unexpected plan change?"

title: Payment Failed or Card Declined
content:
If a payment fails:

- Ask the user to retry with the same card after 5–10 minutes
- Suggest checking with the bank for online transaction blocks
- Recommend updating the payment method in the app: My Account > Billing
- If repeated failures occur, escalate with error screenshots if available

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Please try again in a few minutes and consider updating your payment method in My Account > Billing. If it keeps failing, share any error message you see and I’ll escalate it."

title: How to Update Billing Information
content:
Users can update billing info in the CultPass app:

- Go to My Account
- Open Billing / Payment Methods
- Add a new card and set it as default
- Remove old cards if needed

**Suggested phrasing:**
"You can update your payment method in the app under My Account > Billing. Add the new card and set it as default."

title: Changing Email Address on the Account
content:
To change the email address:

- Verify the user's identity (confirm current email + last reservation date)
- If self-serve is available: My Account > Profile > Email
- If not available, escalate to support with the requested new email

**Suggested phrasing:**
"If you don’t see an option in Profile to update your email, I can escalate this—please share your current email and the new email you want to use."

title: Account Blocked or Suspended
content:
If a user is blocked/suspended:

- Do not accuse the user of wrongdoing
- Confirm whether they received a notice email
- Ask for the account email and any reference id
- Escalate to human support; do not promise a specific outcome

**Suggested phrasing:**
"I can help look into this. Could you share the email on the account and whether you received a notice message? I’ll escalate it to the team."

title: QR Code Not Showing for a Reservation
content:
If the QR code is missing:

- Ask the user to refresh the reservation screen
- Confirm they are logged into the correct account
- Suggest app restart and clearing cache (if applicable)
- If still missing, escalate with reservation id and event name

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Try reopening the reservation and restarting the app. If the QR code still doesn’t show, tell me the event name and reservation details and I’ll escalate."

title: No-Show and Late Arrival Policy
content:
General guidance:

- Users should arrive 10–15 minutes early
- Late arrival may result in denied entry depending on the venue
- No-shows typically do not qualify for refunds

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Please aim to arrive 10–15 minutes early. Venues may deny entry for late arrivals, and no-shows usually aren’t refundable."

title: Premium Experiences and Additional Fees
content:
Some experiences are marked as premium and may require an extra fee:

- The app shows the fee before confirming the reservation
- Fees are charged at reservation time (or per venue rules)
- If the fee looks incorrect, collect screenshots and escalate

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Premium events may have an extra fee shown before you confirm. If it looks wrong, share a screenshot and I’ll escalate."

title: App Crashes or Freezes During Booking
content:
If the app crashes/freezes:

- Ask user to update the app to the latest version
- Restart the device and try again
- Try a different network (Wi-Fi vs mobile)
- If reproducible, collect device model + OS version and escalate

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Please update the app, restart your phone, and try again on a different network. If it still happens, tell me your device model and OS version and I’ll escalate."

title: How to View Past Reservations and Receipts
content:
Users can view history in the app:

- Go to My Account
- Open Reservations / History
- Select an event to see details
- Billing receipts may be under Billing / Payments

**Suggested phrasing:**
"You can see past reservations in My Account > Reservations/History. For payment receipts, check My Account > Billing."
